title: Hardwood Floors, Large Gourmet Kitchens, Spa/Hot Tub
neighborhood: 3001 E Ave K, Grand Prairie, TX
posting_body: Welcome to Meadow Green Apartments in Grand Prairie, TXEnjoy unique and comfortable living at Meadow Green Apartments in Grand Prairie, Texas.

These affordable and spacious one- to two-bedroom homes offer great features like washer/dryer connections, wood-burning fireplaces, gourmet kitchens with breakfast bars, generous closets, ceiling fans, and skylights in select units.
A refreshing pool and ample parking is available to all residents.
Meadow Green has quick access to Highways 360 and 30.
We are minutes from retail, dining, and recreation with Six Flags Over Texas, Hurricane Harbor water park, AT&T Stadium (home to the Dallas Cowboys!), several golf courses, and DFW airport.
Make your appointment today and come see your new home!
Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., TX - License # 9003183
